column3:
“Fantastically Great for chronic insomnia. I have a small, low-dose, joint before going to bed. Releases all the muscle knots and spasms from the day. Pain just melts away with this PPK. Definitely feel wobbly and relaxed after 15 mins. 

Also the time-shifty spacey-ness that helps my mind disengage, slow down, and get into the Time For Some Serious Shut Eye" mode.

column1: Music sounds awesome with this - drifting into a c...”"

column3: “Takes a few extra minutes to take effect, but once it does, it is solid pain and anxiety relief that still allows me to be conscious enough to watch some tv, eat some dinner, and enjoy my family.”

“Got a half z of this for personal use despite the ridiculous 190 #. Was well worth it, the bud was completly purple with a platinum coating of white crystals staying true to its name. The amount of crystals were unreal,and was by far the most well grown purp ive ever come across. The smell was Purply with a little pine at the same time almost like a sweet earthy pine.The flavor was dominated by the piney/diesely kush...”

“Favorite indica I've ever smoked.  I was completely buzzed but totally lucid and able to focus on the plot of the Freaks & Geeks episodes I was watching.  Really nice smell, pretty grapey.  Not the prettiest weed.  Great tasting smoke, easy down the hatch--kind of like LA Confidential, slightly cooling and a little sweet down the hatch.  Very very fun.  Even though it was a 100% indica, I could see myself hanging out...”
“It's sooooo purple! I think I have found the perfect strain....no paranoia...makes me laugh...relaxes me...just f*ckin tremendous!  Just wish it was available more.”

“This absolutely knocked me on my ass. I was expecting to have a normal evening of relaxation, and the universe started to tear apart at the seams, and I couldn't stand up. I would highly recommend to anyone trying this for the first time, don't stack it on top of anything else, and be alone or with one person, because you will not be able to function for a couple of hours.”

“Got this in wax form and let me tell you if you're a true indica fan this one is by far for you! Very good and definitely puts me in relaxation mode good if you have insomnia all hands down is great no negatives :)
Recommended to all bud lovers 💚💛❤️”

“One of my favorite strains. Helps a lot with insomnia and sleeping issues, offers pain relief and a very euphoric effect as well that's lasts longer than normal. Only thing I don't like about it is it makes me crazy hungry, but other than that, pure perfection and always going to be one of my favorites. Not to mention it is the most purple I've ever seen. Once ground up it looks pure purple, beautiful; never disappoi...”
“Very strong indica. Nice indica taste yo uowuld expect with a hint of purp :3”
“I usually smoke oil due to the high THC percentage but it has been unavailable lately. I truly enjoy this strain especially with some fronto leaf. 150 an Oz is amazing in NYC.”
“One of my favorite strains, feels like a Sativa which brings loads of creativity. Has a smooth lavender taste/feel, would recommend to all”
“it's a decent high but the aroma was better. made me sleepy and lasted for about 2 hours on wake & bake.”
“great for sleep. very strong. dont love the musky smell and taste.”
“Just so amazing, I start twitching and I can't stop giggling. Goes down so smooth. Best weed I've had”
“This review is for Platinum Bubba Kush
column4: which has a dark green and purple appearance. I purchased this flower at Green Crop Co-Op in San Diego. The bud is HEAVILY covered in trichomes even to the naked eye. As previously mentioned
column5: the bud is dark green and purple with some beige hairs. The nugs are medium to large and are very impressive. Just as impressive as the look is the smell. This Kush is not nearly as spicy...”"

column3: “Hands down my favorite lighter" indica. Relaxes the body without putting you to sleep. Gives me Sativa-like effects on the onset such as creativity and euphoria
column4: then mellows out into a nice body tingle. I actually use it as an all day indica because I am totally functional on it while some other heavier Indica strains make to too sleepy. Taste is great from a vaporizer or even from a glass pipe with a hemp wick. Th...”"

column3: “great for sleep. very strong. dont love the musky smell and taste.”
“This review is for Platinum Bubba Kush
column4: which has a dark green and purple appearance. I purchased this flower at Green Crop Co-Op in San Diego. The bud is HEAVILY covered in trichomes even to the naked eye. As previously mentioned
column5: the bud is dark green and purple with some beige hairs. The nugs are medium to large and are very impressive. Just as impressive as the look is the smell. This Kush is not nearly as spicy...”"

column3: “it's a decent high but the aroma was better. made me sleepy and lasted for about 2 hours on wake & bake.”

“Most beautiful bud strain I've ever seen. Deep purple and green bud coated with an unbelievably thick layer of trichomes. This bud is so frosty my friends. The deep kushy smell met with a grape aroma warn you of the intense relaxation soon to come. The first time I smoked this I experienced such intense muscle relaxation that I've never been able to get with any other bud strain; literally felt lifted up out of my bo...”

“Total body and mind high - definitely good to go to sleep since it relaxes you completely. Side effects weren't that bad but I did become anxious and paranoid. Then again, I also took some big hits.”
“Just so amazing, I start twitching and I can't stop giggling. Goes down so smooth. Best weed I've had”
“Hands down my favorite lighter" indica. Relaxes the body without putting you to sleep. Gives me Sativa-like effects on the onset such as creativity and euphoria
column4: then mellows out into a nice body tingle. I actually use it as an all day indica because I am totally functional on it while some other heavier Indica strains make to too sleepy. Taste is great from a vaporizer or even from a glass pipe with a hemp wick. Th...”"

column3: “By far the most beautiful purple flower I have ever seen!! Best way to describe her effects- herbal Xanax. Clear calm thighs and full body relaxion... WITHOUT all the prescription pill hassles and side effects. Highly recommend for ppl suffering from anxiety issues. Grabbed an amazing grow from AZ Natural Selections in Peoria.”
“very chill high. good bowl to end the day.”
“it's a decent high but the aroma was better. made me sleepy and lasted for about 2 hours on wake & bake.”

“Platinum purple is probably my favorite strain right now. The high is smooth and relaxing, and it doesn't make me super sleepy. It makes me very hungry, but food tastes really amazing. It feels tingly and wavy.”
“This strain Is super calming, relieves anxiety and pain (if any) . I would highly recommend to anyone who has bad anxiety or pain :)”
“Decent flavor.  Beautiful buds that take your stress away and melt you into la la land.”
“Fantastic, tastes delicious, and is extremely purple”
“top shelf. smooth smoke. crippling relaxation. cosmic travel. it's a dark dank purpley feel. great for night time.”
“solid purp strain - loved the Kush taste from the vape”
“kept me asleep for a full 8 hrs. that's all I wanted. love it.”

“Very relaxing strain, put me to sleep like a baby. 
Inhale very smooth, kinda creeped on me.”
“Makes me focused, yet still relaxed. Not a real long high.”
“Very chill. smooth relaxing high.”
“indica I great for body pain it's still great”
“This was the best strain of pot I have ever had! Maybe I’m just too type A and stressed out that this was the perfect way to unwind.”

“The perfect night-time strain. 
As a previous reviewer had mentioned, the pain, stress, and fatigue from sore muscles just melt away, leaving you relaxed and ready for bed.
You get an extremely relaxed body and mind, and will definitely enjoy peaceful deep sleep. 
One of the most relaxed highs I've experienced in a long time. 

Enjoy!”
“purples on purples on purples. great meds and great times”
“This was the best strain of pot I have ever had! Maybe I’m just too type A and stressed out that this was the perfect way to unwind.”
“I love anything purple. smoking this left me very relaxed, happy, a little talkative but more on chill mode”

“The perfect night-time strain. 
As a previous reviewer had mentioned, the pain, stress, and fatigue from sore muscles just melt away, leaving you relaxed and ready for bed.
You get an extremely relaxed body and mind, and will definitely enjoy peaceful deep sleep. 
One of the most relaxed highs I've experienced in a long time. 

Enjoy!”
“one of my favorites! this is real deal purps, and are potent!”
“purples on purples on purples. great meds and great times”
“good meds”

“I’m not much of a smoker at all because I tend to get paranoid. This is doing me pretty good though. I was able to have a good laugh and not completely freak out. I’ll be getting this again for sure!”

“Awesome stress relief and bed time strain. Smooth. Felt stress melt away. Relaxing. Truly love smoking this one before bed - instant cozy relaxation. Takes a few mins to kick in - but when it does, it’s a full body, relaxing buzz and a nice and spacey head high.”
“this strain provided me with a very nice head high, made me feel nice and relaxed. I especially love the purple hairs and all the crystal tricomes on it.”
“the shit”

“love it! starts off smooth, and then within 15 minutes you really get a good high. the good thing is that you stay focused, and you're not zombified!". Just make sure you have food on stand by cause you are going to get the munchies big time!  lol lol lol!”"
“Great strain for night time really relaxing and I get what it means when it says sativa head high woth indica body”
“It's flavor is great. you will really enjoy this deep euphoric high.”
“Pretty dense nugs with purple patches on the nugs covered and the smell is incredible like pine and berry a lot .. Long lasting high”

“I'm a huge indica fan, especially the grape variety. GDP was my go-to champion indica but upon finding this beyond awe-inspiring buds..upon first look it's unreal! more purple than green in a beautiful way that's unique to this strain. I. Love. This. Strain, period! it is my go to indica at nights and it never fails to defeat my insomnia or a racing sad head at bedtime of even if I just wanna relax when I get home. A...”
“One of the best strains for pain”
“This is a great sleep med and beats the nightmares too. Helps with pain deep muscle pain it is excellent.”
“This made me quite stoned.”
“This strain was awesome this is wonderful if you're having trouble sleeping”
“The BEST Purple Flowers AVAILABLE”
“very very good taste”
“indica I great for body pain it's still great”

“It's been a few yrs since I got my hands on this beauty. As a fibromyalgia patient, I have to give it a 9.. knocked me on my ass mid conversation w| my partner last night. woke up to my legs still feeling tingly from a 6a sesh since its snowing out, my chronic pain folks know what a gem that is. Don't pass this up if you're a chance.”
“Very useful for pain and insomnia. For me, feels like more of a nighttime strain”

“This Indica is perfect after a long day to fully relax your body & mind.
Your body feels so loose, like you're floating in water, but it's not too much of a sleepy-hitter. 
You're able to stay awake & enjoy the water, so you can definitely feel the Sativa effects.
A deep meditation like-feel is the best way to describe the feeling.
It's definitely a creeper! So don't smoke too much at once or you'll just get higher &...”
“Very chill. smooth relaxing high.”
“solid purp strain - loved the Kush taste from the vape”
“purple goodness right out the bag... great strain for relaxing and getting some needed REM sleep.  tastes and smells like a typical purp strain.”
“PPK I have had stronger strains but this one gets ya baked and keeps ya only half couch locked”

“Awesome stress relief and bed time strain. Smooth. Felt stress melt away. Relaxing. Truly love smoking this one before bed - instant cozy relaxation. Takes a few mins to kick in - but when it does, it’s a full body, relaxing buzz and a nice and spacey head high.”

“Very relaxing strain, put me to sleep like a baby. 
Inhale very smooth, kinda creeped on me.”
“top shelf. smooth smoke. crippling relaxation. cosmic travel. it's a dark dank purpley feel. great for night time.”
“Decent flavor.  Beautiful buds that take your stress away and melt you into la la land.”
“What a great strain relaxing and so soothing if You need to chill and want a great night sleep or a good couch lock to just chill and unwind try this bud it’s absolutely fire!!!!!!!!”
“Strong hit from the bong, suuuper baked. Beautiful strain. Smoke before bed”

“Perfect for when it's bedtime but you're still wound up and stressed from the day.  Not much of a head-high or stoned feeling, but the muscle relaxation is very evident within 10 mins of smoking this.  
I was suffering from work fatigue, but so stressed and amped (I work in the service industry) when I get home that it's hard for me to sleep.  This flower put me to bed in no time and was the coziest, best sleep I've ...”

“I’m not much of a smoker at all because I tend to get paranoid. This is doing me pretty good though. I was able to have a good laugh and not completely freak out. I’ll be getting this again for sure!”

“The perfect night-time strain. 
As a previous reviewer had mentioned, the pain, stress, and fatigue from sore muscles just melt away, leaving you relaxed and ready for bed.
You get an extremely relaxed body and mind, and will definitely enjoy peaceful deep sleep. 
One of the most relaxed highs I've experienced in a long time. 

Enjoy!”
“This was the best strain of pot I have ever had! Maybe I’m just too type A and stressed out that this was the perfect way to unwind.”
“Makes me focused, yet still relaxed. Not a real long high.”
“kept me asleep for a full 8 hrs. that's all I wanted. love it.”
“Fantastic, tastes delicious, and is extremely purple”

“This beautiful purple fluff has appeal just off its looks alone. The darkest stuff I've ever been able to get my hands on. Smells great, smokes harsh. But it gives you an intense head buzz right off the bat. Great pm strain that really helped my insomnia.”

“I really liked this strain definitely better for night time smoking. i have insomnia and this strain really helps that. I will say i smoked a blunt of this and it made my vision do some weird things but i thought it was pretty cool lol a bowl of this strain really helps you wind down after a stressful day.”

“This strain is absolutely wonderful. I was told it was called Platinum Purple Bubba Kush but nonetheless it made me and my girlfriend feel so great and powerful. We are both sufferers of depression and on this strain we couldn't be happier.”

“Nice smooth taste.Almost tastes like Sativa.It dont choke you to death.I use for pain and anxiety.And works moderately good.But I have had better for the pain.Wake and Bake,after 2 hitters will definitely wake up your creative mind to start off the day.”

“It might not win any contest anytime soon but I gave this 5 stars because it tasted awesome, put me in a good spot, looked and smelled premium. Not too strong or overpowering either. Usually my go to indica.”
“purples on purples on purples. great meds and great times”
“I love anything purple. smoking this left me very relaxed, happy, a little talkative but more on chill mode”

“this bud right here!  oh wow, i bet god smoked this.  from its piney grapy to tasting the same.  #stonedeyes you canstill function, which is kinda awesome.  for pain and sleep though, unbelievable!  really helps, im a medical patient and am i glad i ran across yhis strand”
“one of my favorites! this is real deal purps, and are potent!”

“I tried it last night for the first time and it was so relaxing. The body high on this was amazing. Once you sit down from smoking this it's extremely hard to get back up lmao, oh and it also made me extremely hungry. Also very strong flavors.”

“Man, the crystals. This herb looks like a fresh layer of snow on some crisp green grass. Tastes like that too. Fresh, fruity, berryliscious. The high is pretty heavy, yet focused enough to function. Although, it can lay you out too. Excellent pain relief and stress relief - makes your long day ancient history immediately.”

“Grown this stuff a few times, not the best producer, but its some decent finished product, east to crow and forgiving in soil or hydro.
 I think its a little lagy of a high and I tend to smoke too much of it because of that.  It kinda makes you sleepy sometimes so its a better chill'n around the house kinda High.  Made the mistake of smoking it at Coachella and it just made us want to chill out and not go run amuck ...”
“Super crystaly buds with some purple here and there in it. Not much of a strong aroma but it is very indica and musky kind of smell. super bomb.320oz”
“an amazing sight for sure. super earthy very sticky bud. not extremely dank but I'd buy it again”

“This review is for Platinum Bubba Kush, which has a dark green and purple appearance. I purchased this flower at Green Crop Co-Op in San Diego. The bud is HEAVILY covered in trichomes even to the naked eye. As previously mentioned, the bud is dark green and purple with some beige hairs. The nugs are medium to large and are very impressive. Just as impressive as the look is the smell. This Kush is not nearly as spicy ...”
“It feels like a purple...nice body high, relaxed mental state.”

“I'm really just not feeling it with this stuff. I'm very euphoric and relaxed, but it's missing positivity. I'm instantly hungry, so that's something. But I want to go to bed now, so yeah, I'm in a really uncomfortable place.”
“took half and knock out! edible is no joke lol”
“One of the most beautiful buds I've ever seen. The purple was barely noticeable due to the high concentration of thc crystals. By far one of my faves.”

“I happily tried this strain for the first time after enjoying different purple strains the week before. HOLY omg this stuff, after 1 puny bowl, had me sick as a dog. I've literally never felt worse in my life. Thanks to spine and kidney problems, I have a relatively high tolerance to marijuana and pain killers alike, but PPK left me puking and peeing all over myself - that is when I wasn't experiencing hypoxia and gr...”
